channel.title: Jenkins on My Blog
channel.description: Recent content in Jenkins on My Blog

item.title: Jenkins
item.description: 安装 # 从docker安装 docker run -d -u root --name jenkins \ -p 8080:8080 -p 50000:50000 \ -v /root/jenkins_2112:/var/jenkins_home \ jenkins/jenkins:2.112-alpine # 查看admin初始password docker exec -it jenkins cat /var/jenkins_home/secrets/initialAdminPassword 安装docker 插件
